bulge.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a curved mass on the surface of something, usually caused by something under or inside it
bulge.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The gun made a bulge under his jacket.
bulge.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a sudden temporary increase in the amount or level of something
bulge.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to stick out in a rounded shape, especially because something is very full or too tight
bulge.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: His pockets were bulging with candy.
He fell heavily to the floor, his eyes bulging wide with fear.
